```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

load_and_inspect <- function(file_path) {
  data <- read_csv(file_path)
  print(glimpse(data))
  return(data)
}

urban_noise <- load_and_inspect("urban_noise_levels.csv")
```

## 5.1 Base R Histogram

```{r}
hist(
  urban_noise$decibel_level,
  main = "Distribution of Noise Levels",
  xlab = "Noise Level (dB)",
  col = "lightblue",
  border = "white"
)
```

## 5.2 Scatter Plot

```{r}
ggplot(
  data = urban_noise,
  aes(x = temperature_c, y = decibel_level)
) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6, size = 2, colour = "blue") +
  geom_smooth(colour = "gray") +
  labs(
    title = "Relationship Between Temperature and Noise Level",
    x = "Temperature (Â°C)",
    y = "Noise Level (dB)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```

## 5.3 Boxplot

```{r}
ggplot(
  data = urban_noise,
  aes(x = factor(is_weekend), y = decibel_level, fill = factor(is_weekend))
) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(
    title = "Noise Levels on Weekends vs Weekdays",
    x = "Weekend (1 = Yes, 0 = No)",
    y = "Noise Level (dB)"
  ) +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```

## 5.4 Faceted Histogram

```{r}
ggplot(
  data = urban_noise,
  aes(x = decibel_level)
) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 20, fill = "coral", color = "black") +
  facet_wrap(~ is_weekend) +
  labs(
    title = "Noise Level Distribution on Weekends vs Weekdays",
    x = "Noise Level (dB)",
    y = "Count"
  )
```

## 5.5 Export

```{r}
ggsave("temperature_vs_noise.png", width = 8, height = 6)
```
